headline: Tenant Concerns Lead Barclays to Lower VICI Target
summary: VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE:VICI) is included among the 15 Dividend Stocks Paying 4%+ Yield in 2025. On December 3, Barclays lowered its price target on VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE:VICI) to $33 from $37 and kept an Overweight rating on the shares. The firm adjusted its net lease estimates based on Q3 earnings and recent transactions. The […]

headline: VICI Properties (VICI): Assessing Valuation After Strong Q3, Higher Guidance, Dividend Affirmation and Share Price Pullback
summary: VICI Properties (VICI) just checked three big boxes for income focused investors: it affirmed its quarterly dividend at $0.45 per share, backed that payout with stronger Q3 results, and is now trading at a more appealing valuation. See our latest analysis for VICI Properties. Even after that dividend affirmation and solid Q3 update, VICI’s 1 month share price return of negative 8.8 percent and 3 month share price return of negative 16.3 percent show momentum has cooled. However, its 5 year...
